article.title: Teledyne to Develop High-Definition Focal Planes
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Teledyne Scientific and Imaging L.L.C., Thousand Oaks, California, was awarded a $7 million cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for program development for high-definition focal planes on alternative low-cost substrates to reduce focal plane costs and develop high-definition formats.Â The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Fort Belvoir, Virginia, is the contracting activity.
